title: Pick a Hotel
question_text:
Great Eastern Hotels reported an average stay of $4.8$ nights with a standard deviation of $2.8$ nights, while Motel Seven reported an average stay of $2.2$ nights with a standard deviation of $1.7$ nights. Random samples of $45$ hotels from each hotel chain were taken by a company that was hired to answer the question: "What is the probability that the average stay at a Motel Seven is $3$ nights or less than an average stay at a Great Eastern Hotel?" What is that answer? Round your answer to the nearest percent.
What is that answer? Round your answer to the nearest percent.
